assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Banco Products (India) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile components for OEM markets in India and internationally. The company offers engine cooling modules, such as radiators, charged air coolers, fuel coolers, oil coolers, and condensers for passenger cars; light, medium, and heavy commercial vehicle; agricultural tractors; high performance bikes; harvesters; construction machineries; power generation equipment; traction rail locomotives; and other related equipment applications. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1961 and is based in Vadodara, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. P. R. Allinson
companyOfficers.title: Managing Director of NEDERLANDSE RADIATEUREN FABR1EK B.V.
